feature1.explanation: Paragraph 1 uses hyphens and commas, while Paragraph 2 uses commas and parentheses. Both paragraphs use punctuation marks consistently.

feature2.explanation: Paragraph 1 includes a mix of complex and simple vocabulary, while Paragraph 2 is more straightforward and informational. Both paragraphs display varied word choices.

feature3.explanation: Paragraph 1 has longer and more complex sentences with multiple clauses, while Paragraph 2 consists of shorter, more direct sentences. Both paragraphs maintain coherence and cohesion.

feature4.explanation: Paragraph 1 has a more informal and narrative tone, whereas Paragraph 2 adopts a formal and instructional tone. Both paragraphs present different narrative styles and speech events.

feature5.explanation: Both paragraphs are free of spelling and typographical errors.

overall.explanation: Considering the differences in tone and narrative style, along with some variations in vocabulary and sentence structure, the overall confidence in the same authorship of the two texts is moderate.
